name: @azure/openai-test
author: Microsoft Corporation
description: This is not a real package. Its purpose is to run tests/ validate Azure OpenAI endpoints with the Stainless OpenAI SDK.

scripts.audit: node ../../../common/scripts/rush-audit.js && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i --package-lock-only 2>&1 && npm audit
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && tsc -p . && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.test: npm run clean && tsc -p . && npm run unit-test:node && dev-tool run bundle && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
